choices.label: The change has no impact on the behavior of the method.
After the change, the method will never check the first element in list b.
After the change, the method will never check the last element in list b.
After the change, the method will never check the first and the last elements in list b.

content.answer: After the change, the method will never check the first element in list b.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
